title: UP wins North Zone athletic championship
content:
The article below represents a preview only and is not meant for reuse or republishing. 
Hamirpur (HP), Sept. 27 -- Uttar Pradesh won the overall North zone interstate athletic championship while Delhi emerged runners up in the two-day event which concluded here today. 
Nearly 800 boys and girls from eight northern states took part in the championship that was held first time in Himachal Pradesh. 

Hamirpur Deputy Commissioner Rohan Chand Thakur gave away trophies and prizes to the winners at the closing function. 

Navnit Kaur, Pushpinder Kaur, Ritika Singh, Veerpal Kaur were adjudged best athletes among under-14, under-16, under-18 and under 20 categories respectively in the girls section. 

In the boys section, Abhay Gupta, Abhishek and Nishan Singh were adjudged best athletes in the under-16, under-18 and under-20 categories r...
